column1: Little Goat Diner////Our server was super friendly - he was very willing to answer our questions
column2: and provided some recommendations of his preferred orders. Many of those in our group actually got the dishes he ordered
column3: including the Smoked Corned Beef Hash with Egg and the Los Drowned. Since I had just eaten
column4: I asked for a dark chocolate sorbet (off the menu item
column5: but I saw it as an ingredient in a milkshake so I asked for it).
